// This file was generated by SquareLine Studio
// SquareLine Studio version: SquareLine Studio 1.4.2
// LVGL version: 9.1.0
// Project name: LCD50_854x480_prj

#include "ui.h"
#include "Arduino.h"
#include "lcd_util.h" 
extern uint8_t brightness;
extern uint8_t can_start;
uint8_t buff[20];

void start_event(lv_event_t * e)
{
		can_start = 1;
}

void event_down(lv_event_t * e)
{
 brightness = brightness - 2;
	if (brightness < 2)brightness =1;
  Set_Backlight_480(brightness);
	
	sprintf(buff,"Brightness %d",brightness); 
  lv_label_set_text(ui_brightness,buff);
}

void stop_event(lv_event_t * e)
{
		can_start = 0;
}

void event_up(lv_event_t * e)
{
		brightness = brightness + 2;
	if (brightness>100)brightness =100;
  Set_Backlight_480(brightness);

	sprintf(buff,"Brightness %d",brightness); 
  lv_label_set_text(ui_brightness,buff);
}
